thread.title: VW Arteon, Alpine A110, Hyundai Ioniq: What’s New @ The Car Connection
thread.title_full: VW Arteon, Alpine A110, Hyundai Ioniq: What’s New @ The Car Connection

author: Andrew Ganz (feedback@highgearmedia.com)
title: VW Arteon, Alpine A110, Hyundai Ioniq: What’s New @ The Car Connection
text: Volkswagen goes flashy with new Arteon fastback sedan Volkswagen isn't exactly known for its daring styling, but the traditionally buttoned-up German brand has shown off its more glamorous side with a new fastback sedan that will eventually replace the slow-selling CC here. Marchionne would still merge with General Motors, but is it the right fit?...
